name: Shroom Dood: the misfortune of the staff
name_original: Shroom Dood: the misfortune of the staff
description:
This is a game about funny mushroom guy. 

 He, unfortunatly, falled in some wierd place (like in all good games), but luckuly he had his staff, which gives him abillity to move all kind of objects - from boxes to barelles!

 But oh oh! All of the modules dropped from the staff! Help Shroom Dood recolect all of the modules and regain power of his almost broken and unstable wand! 

Controls:

- Move with WASD (but actually only A and D are usefull)

- Jump with a Space bar

- Aim at what you want to grab with mouse

- And Grab with left mouse button

- Reset room with R

- Fullscreen with F11

- And exit with esc!
